text: Kuma Yahudu da Nasara sun ce: "Mu ne ɗiyan Allah, kuma masoyansa." Ka ce: "To, don me Yake yi muku azaba da zunubanku? A'a ku mutane ne daga waɗanda Ya halitta, Yana gafartawa ga wanda Yake so, kuma Yana azabta wanda Yake so. Kuma Allah ne da mulkin sammai da ƙasa da abin da ke tsakaninsu kuma zuwa gare shi makoma take
